full_summary:
**Tender Announcement and Request for Proposal**
==========================

### Title

W6856-232008: Steel Gratings and Specialty Steel Sheets

### Reference Number

WS4252771453-Doc4252805946

### Amendment Number

Amendment 5

### Publication Date

February 29, 2024

### Tender Closing Date

April 5, 2024 at 14:00 hours

### Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence, seeks proposals for the acquisition of steel gratings and specialty steel sheets as detailed in the Statement of Requirements (Annex). The tender includes delivery in Courcelette, Québec, Canada.

**Scope of Work**

The contract involves the supply of:

* 262 steel plates (duckboards)
* Other specialty steel sheets

### Key Dates

* **Start Date:** November 10, 2023
* **End Date:** May 30, 2024
* **Amendment Date:** April 3, 2024

### Tender Requirements

This is a competitive tender, with tenders evaluated based on the lowest price. The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) is applicable for this procurement process.

### Contact Information

* François S. Martineau, PSPC/SPAC
* Email: [francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Notice URL

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18946335?extsite=MTg5NDYzMzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### UNSPSC Codes

* 30102200: Plate
* 30103200: Grating
* 30161715: Duckboards
* 30264200: Specialty steel sheets

The unwieldy parts like the `**contactInfoPhone**` entry are not included in this rewritten entry, also make sure to know which UNSPSC reference are required for the final output. The output now is in a better readable and follow the standard markdown format.  I have also maintained consistency with dates and details. It is expected that words exceeding 400 characters must be truncated. I used bracketing and combining fields to keep text focused and soft spaces increased to aid readability, pending translations.
